title: God Only Knows
lyrics:
God only knows the price that you pay
For the ones you hurt along the way
If I should betray myself today
God only knows the price I pay
God only knows

God only knows

God only knows the way that I feel

Is only a part of the way I feel

If I can't reveal the way that I feel

God only knows the way I feel

God only knows

God only knows



Now I lay me down to sleep

I pray the Lord my soul to keep

If I should die before I wake

I pray the Lord my soul to take



God only knows

God only knows

God only knows

God only knows



God only knows when I'm not true

To the things that I say, and the things I do

And if I can't be true to the things that I do

God only knows the way I feel



God only knows

God only knows

God only knows

God only knows
